name: Reaching Hand

address: No 44, 1st Floor, Nehru Road, Yadava Layout, Aravind Nagar, St. Thomas Town Post
Kammanahalli Extn, St. Thomas Town Post, Opposite State Bank of Hyderabad

briefDescription: Reaching Hand is a registered Charitable Trust started in 1996 in Bangalore to work with underprivileged children, vulnerable youths & disadvantaged women. It envisions an empowered future for all by acting as a catalyst for social change. Reaching Hand empowers the children, youths and women through its innovative programme focusing on providing quality education, health care services and skill development training so that they lead a life of self-worth, hope & dignity. Reaching Hand has impacted more than 15000 children so far with its innovative projects.

address: Kammanahalli Extn, St. Thomas Town Post, Opposite State Bank of Hyderabad
